title: 대조·양보 — although/however/on the other hand
intent: although, however, on the other hand로 대조와 양보를 논리적으로 표현한다.
lexset: although, though, however, nevertheless, on the other hand, in contrast, despite, whereas
traps: although vs but 동시 사용 금지

seeds.en: Although it was raining, I went out.
He's busy. On the other hand, I'm free.
Though I was tired, I kept working.
Although I studied, I failed the exam.
The weather wasn't good. However, we enjoyed it.
Though I don't have money, I'm happy.
He's young. On the other hand, he's experienced.
Although I was late, I attended.
